sentences.sentence: Flower, reciprocal, clouds scud across, is one year.
sentences.translation: 花开花谢，此消彼长，云卷云舒，又是一年。

sentences.sentence: So, you've built a SCUD storm. Think you can defend it?
sentences.translation: 这么看来，你建造了一个生化死雨。你认为你能守住它吗？

sentences.sentence: This makes yellow team members were very angry, and Scud-Xiao Ming can be angry it!
sentences.translation: 这使黄队队员们愤怒极了，飞毛腿小明可气愤呢！
